overview: Jerome Shneider has over 40 years of business experience. A CPA by profession, he started his career at Arthur Andersen as an auditor of service, merchandising and manufacturing companies. He subsequently left Andersen to obtain his MBA at the University of Chicago and then continued his career as CFO of two manufacturing companies in the Chicago area. After a stint at the Chicago Board of Trade, he then joined Kelly, Scott and Madison in 1986 as its CFO until 2005. The latter company provides strategic media marketing services including research, planning, promotion, negotiation and execution of media. An avid collector with an active interest in the Internet combined with his extensive exposure and understanding of the advertising industry resulted in the creation of the eMusea concept.
